Articles.Content:
Step One! Get the NovaPunch remix pack here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4180.0 If you already have it, pat yourself on the back.

Step Two! Build the attached lander with the 9 second solid booster (Doesn\'t have to be perfect, but it\'s only a couple simple peices)

Step Three! Launch, and clear the tower before maneuvering.

Step Four! Survive! Scoring based off least amount of pieces broken first, and by distance to initial launch area second.

Attached: The lander, followed by my attempt.

(Please note: The engine is the 9 second 1m solid booster, not any sort of LFE)
